bug.author: Fay-Hu
bug.summary: pipcook run with some problems, ETIMEDOUT
bug.description:
The detial: pipcook run ./example/pipelines/object-detection.json âœ– Error: connect ETIMEDOUT 104.16.20.35:80 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13618408/84975711-ac0d1b80-b158-11ea-96d5-d933cfe5e786.png></denchmark-link>
What shoud i do, please?

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Fay-Hu>@Fay-Hu</denchmark-link> , how do you get the screenshot?

Hi @Fay-Hu, how do you get the screenshot?
visit 104.16.20.35:80 on broswer
And you can try pipcook pipeline install ./example/object-detection.json firstly to make sure if the plugin installation is ok.
The 104.16.20.35 is one of ips for resolving registry.npmjs.com, may I ask you to try with: pipcook pipeline install ./example/object-detection.json?

<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13618408/84976431-681b1600-b15a-11ea-9845-c48764d396ac.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13618408/84976473-8b45c580-b15a-11ea-8432-0ab3a1233a6e.png></denchmark-link>
then got daemon is not started, run "pipcook daemon start"
Yea, make sure the daemon is up and try pipcook run again?
Thanks for your response, it's ok now.
